name: INSEAD
mission: "As a global educational institution with a pioneering multi-campus model, our mission is to promote a non-dogmatic learning environment that brings together people, cultures and ideas from around the world, changing lives, and helping transform organizations through management education. Through teaching, we develop responsible, thoughtful leaders and entrepreneurs who create value for their organizations and their communities. Through research, we expand the frontiers of academic thought and influence business practice."
postgrad: 1000+ MBA students on two campuses in two intakes; 12,000+ EMBA students and executive education participants
